overview:
Matt Daimler is a successful entrepreneur with a strong product management background and computer engineering degree.

Matt Daimler founded the award-winning travel website SeatGuru.com in 2001. SeatGuru was incorporated in 2003 following its incredible success with the just-launched Google AdSense program. Google promoted SeatGuruâ€™s success as a case study for other website publishers. After years of significant traffic and revenue growth, industry leader Expedia purchased SeatGuru in early 2007. At the time of the sale, the site averaged 1 million unique users and 5 million page views each month.

Prior to SeatGuru, Matt worked for technology companies in San Francisco and Seattle. Matt has a BS in Computer Engineering with a minor in Entrepreneurship and Management from Johns Hopkins University and currently resides in New York City.

funding_round.source_description: Airport Info App GateGuru Launches On Android; Raises $800K
